name: Full Band Studio Recording *STUDIO TIME ONLY*
description: Paying online has a $3 Transaction fee. REFER TO CONTACT US FOR QUOTES ON EP/ALBUM PACKAGES! An in studio (or on-site optional) recording with: -8 Hours of Studio Time (One Song Limit) -PreProduction -Mixing -Editing -Mastering -Pitch Correction Contains: - Wave High Quality verison of your recording - 1080p Video with your song & album artwork noted on the right - Video mention above hosted on our channel. Example: Click here **NOTE in order to book a date use the contact us button on the right after paying the studio time.** Please state your: -band name -genre/style -number of members -any previous recordings you may have we will contact you promptly via email

name: Studio Recording MP3/YOUTUBE/WAVE Digital Delivery
description: Paying online has a $3 Transaction fee. THIS PRODUCT IS ONLY for artists who have completed their studio time and are ready to make the final payment.
